item.title: How to Use This Theme in Your Project
item.description: Downlaod vscode Navigate to VsCode website, just download in your pc. Install Hugo environment In hugo offical website, there are four options to install hugo env which depends on your operation system(OS). Install Git Install Go version 1.18 or later Update your PATH environment variable as described in the Go documentation Hugo CLI Create a new site 1 2 3 4 hugo new site mywebsiteName # naviagate to the new folder, open in VScode cd mywebsiteName Download theme and import to themes folder You can clone theme project or download zip directly.
